messages.message: Got it @Ted, @Loc can help you with this

this is there error I got: ```
[2019-04-10 20:36:55,770: ERROR/ForkPoolWorker-1] Retrying again on AriService
[2019-04-10 20:36:55,771: ERROR/ForkPoolWorker-1] failed to resolve sockaddr for :7070
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/ibuser/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/thrift/transport/TSocket.py", line 95, in open
    addrs = self._resolveAddr()
  File "/home/ibuser/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/thrift/transport/TSocket.py", line 42, in _resolveAddr
    socket.AI_PASSIVE | socket.AI_ADDRCONFIG)
  File "/home/ibuser/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/gevent/_socketcommon.py", line 276, in getaddrinfo
    return get_hub().resolver.getaddrinfo(host, port, family, socktype, proto, flags)
  File "/home/ibuser/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/gevent/resolver_thread.py", line 65, in getaddrinfo
    return self.pool.apply(_socket.getaddrinfo, args, kwargs)
  File "/home/ibuser/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/gevent/pool.py", line 325, in apply
    return self.spawn(func, *args, **kwds).get()
  File "/home/ibuser/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/gevent/event.py", line 385, in get
    return self.get(block=False)
  File "/home/ibuser/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/gevent/event.py", line 375, in get
    return self._raise_exception()
  File "/home/ibuser/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/gevent/event.py", line 355, in _raise_exception
    reraise(*self.exc_info)
  File "/home/ibuser/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/gevent/threadpool.py", line 211, in _worker
    value = func(*args, **kwargs)
gaierror: [Errno -2] Name or service not known
[2019-04-10 20:36:55,771: ERROR/ForkPoolWorker-1] Error creating thrift client failed to resolve sockaddr for :7070
[2019-04-10 20:36:55,772: ERROR/ForkPoolWorker-1] Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/instabase/workers/celery-image-tasks/py/instabase/utils/rpc/pool.py", line 62, in _create_thrift_client
    transport.open()
  File "/home/ibuser/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/thrift/transport/TTransport.py", line 152, in open
    return self.__trans.open()
  File "/home/ibuser/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/thrift/transport/TSocket.py", line 99, in open
    raise TTransportException(TTransportException.NOT_OPEN, msg)
TTransportException: failed to resolve sockaddr for :7070```
i tried Jonathan suggestion of resetting the stack but no luck
i have also pulled in master earlier today

mhmm ```User setup checks ...
Starting server ...
I0410 20:36:33.242691    10 server.cpp:60] LOG LEVEL: 0 VERBOSITY: 0
I0410 20:36:33.243535    10 server.cpp:70] Initializing FREngine ...
I0410 20:36:34.231976    10 server.cpp:112] Serving on port 7070 ...```
process files used ocr-ari and that ran fine too
So, in your `docker-env.json` inside image tasks, can you set the following?   `"tservice_ocr_ari_host": "docker.for.mac.localhost",`
Ahh, I remember getting stuck on that too
looks like image tasks is trying to resolve `:7070`
Will add that to a README in image-tasks
You can just add that and keep it.  I don’t think it really matters if the OCR doesn’t run
